doc:
Robert Raglan https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Raglan 0 Robert Raglan (7 April 1909 – 18 July 1985) was a British actor best known for his semi-regular role in Dad's Army as Colonel Pritchard. He also starred in a number of other television series and films such as Fabian of the Yard (1954–56) and The Haunted House of Horror (1969). He also appeared in Danger Man with Patrick McGoohan. Robert_Raglan ( 7_April_1909 – 18_July_1985 ) was a_British_actor best_known for his_semi-regular_role in Dad 's_Army as Colonel_Pritchard . He also starred in a_number of other_television_series_and_films such_as Fabian of the_Yard_(_1954 – 56_) and The_Haunted_House of Horror_(_1969_) . He also appeared in Danger_Man with Patrick_McGoohan .
